name: Die vs Dead!
description:
Fight for survival against an endless horde of zombies, with your only weapon being a set of dice! Will you roll something good or bad? Put your luck and skill to the test.

Whichever side comes up, something's bound to happen! And if multiple die have matching faces...

  • Club: lets loose a projectile storm
  • Spade: grants an extra dash
  • Heart: drops a health pickup
  • Diamond: drops score pickups
  • Skull: spawns in more enemies
  • Null: flips other dice to null

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme of "Roll of the Dice".

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D - Move
  • Space - Dash
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Click - Fast throw
  • Right Click - Long throw
  • Esc - Pause
  • F9 - Toggle fullscreen

Created by:

  • Dan Blain (dman4380): Programming - Design
  • Bevan Guest (Bevoishot): Art - Sound - Design

Music:

"Video Dungeon Boss" by Kevin MacLeod
